channel.title: Network Hard Disks:
channel.description:
Network Hard Disks:
You should set these up! They make your computer so much quieter, it is unbelievable, normally when I unrar some big file, the hard disk goes crazy, now I cannot hear a thing. There is almost no difference in speed, only the start is laggy. You can also share these to multiple operating systems, which means one set of files for every computer. You guys should try it!!

item.title: Network Hard Disks:

You should set these up!
They make your computer so much quieter, it is unbelievable, normally when I unrar some big file, the hard disk goes crazy, now I cannot hear a thing.
There is almost no difference in speed, only the start is laggy.
You can also share these to multiple operating systems, which means one set of files for every computer.
You guys should try it!!
[/quote]

Your harddrive blows then, mine is always quite![/quote]
Your speeling is good.

Read full topic

item.title: Network Hard Disks:
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

On another topic

I’d rather listen to my computer grinding itself to shreds for 1 minute, than wait 10 minutes for it do unrar a file in silence.

It unrars super fast if it is more than a 10mbit connection (most are 100mbit, some a gbit).

  • Server hard disks will unrar even faster.

Read full topic

item.title: Network Hard Disks:
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

I have my server networked via samba, and it’s useful for web development (no need for FTP), but I sure as hell wouldn’t use it for storage etc.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

When I try to unrar or rar something huge and my computer makes these crazy sounds like it’s on crack. Isn’t it the shitty computer’s fault?

item.title: Network Hard Disks:
item.dc:creator: @runescape3dude runescape3dude
item.description:
@runescape3dude wrote:

[quote=“Cruzer, post:2, topic:237640”]Omg!
How do I do this!
What do you mean!
Ah[/quote]
If you have an old computer laying around somewhere!! Put an internet cable into it!! Give it a static IP!! Share it’s hard disk!! Connect to the shared hard disk from your main computer!!
[size=30pt]!![/size]

Read full topic
